definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation

sentences.english: To be sure, Europe has come far over the past 10 years.
sentences.chinese: 誠然，過去10年歐洲已經有了長足進步。

sentences.english: Yet, under his rule, the colony made progress.
sentences.chinese: 然而，殖民地在他的治理下卻有了長足進步。

sentences.english: Since 30 years of reform and opening up, Chinas transportation industry has made considerable progress.
sentences.chinese: 改革開放30年來，我國來通運輸業取得了長足進步。
